alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Phillips; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 8:08AM CST until November 29 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle and light snow. A light glaze of ice is expected and up to a dusting of snow. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Phillips, Smith and Jewell Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions through the afternoon. Be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing drizzle will continue to transition to snow through this morning and afternoon. Temperatures will remain below freezing and untreated roads will likely remain slick into the afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
